Knight Co. Daily Face Wash

Brand: Knight Co

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: Purified Water (Aqua), Sodium Olivate, Glycerin, Rosa Rubiginosa (Rose Hip) Seed Oil*, Eriobotrya Japonica Extract, Chondrus Crispus (Seaweed) Extract*, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice*, Glycolic Acid, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Rosmarinus Offici

t, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil*, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Salvia Officinalis (Sage) Leaf Extract, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract*

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive
